info.generatorArgAppConfig: Path to the application config file or application config as a string.

error.headlessGenOptions: Please provide one of the following: 1) The first argument of the file path to the application config file, 2) The first argument of the application config file as a JSON string, or 3) The option `appconfig` as a JSON object.
error.generationExiting: Application generation exiting due to error: {{- error}}
